ConfirmationStep.title: Booking Confirmed!
ConfirmationStep.subtitle: Your booking has been successfully completed and tickets have been issued.
ConfirmationStep.bookingReferenceNote: Use this reference for check-in and customer support
ConfirmationStep.supportMessage: Need assistance? Contact our customer service at

PassengersStep.title: Passenger Details
PassengersStep.subtitle: Please provide details for all passengers. Make sure passport information matches travel documents.

PaymentStep.title: Payment
PaymentStep.subtitle: Choose your preferred payment method
PaymentStep.secureDescription: All payment information is encrypted and secure. Your card will be charged immediately after confirmation.

errors.expiryDate: Expiry must be in format MM/YY

ReviewBookingStep.reviewFlightDetails: Please review your flight details and passenger information
ReviewBookingStep.termsAndConditions: I agree to the terms and conditions of carriage

SeatSelection.title: Select Your Seats
SeatSelection.subtitle: Choose up to 9 seats for your journey

checkIn.title: Check-in
checkIn.description: How to check-in for your flight

myTickets.title: My Tickets history
myTickets.noTickets: You don't have any tickets yet

errors.loadFlight: Could not load flight details. Please try again.
errors.noSeatsSelected: Please select at least one seat to continue
errors.reservationFailed: Could not reserve seats. Please try again.

baggage.title: Baggage information
baggage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about baggage allowances, rates, and special items.

allowance.title: Baggage allowance by class
allowance.description: Each fare class has different baggage allowances.

important.title: Inportant
important.description: Size restrictions apply: hand luggage should not exceed 56×36×23 cm, and personal belongings should be placed under the seat in front of you.

lang.title: Important
lang.description: Size restrictions apply: hand luggage must not exceed 56×36×23 cm and personal items must fit under the seat in front of you.

children.title: Strollers and car seats
children.text1: One stroller and one car seat per child - free of charge
children.text2: They can be returned at check-in or at the boarding gate. Car seats can be taken on board if a seat is purchased and the seat is certified.

sports.title: Sports equipment
sports.text: Most sports equipment can be transported as checked baggage, subject to the following:

table.golf_notes: One bag with clubs, balls and shoes.
table.bike_notes: Must be packed in a special box.

instruments.title: Musical instruments
instruments.text: Musical instruments can be transported as follows:
instruments.small: Small instruments (violins, wind instruments) - in hand luggage.
instruments.medium: Medium (guitars, saxophones) - may require a seat purchase.
instruments.large: Large (cellos, double basses) - as cargo or checked baggage
instruments.note: All instruments must be in a hard case.

medical.title: Medical equipment
medical.text: Medical equipment allowed free of charge in excess of baggage allowance:
medical.notice: Notify customer service at least 48 hours before departure

restrictions.title: Baggage Restrictions
restrictions.description: Items that are prohibited or restricted for transportation.

notice.title: Security Announcement
notice.description: For security reasons, certain items are prohibited. Violation of the rules may result in confiscation, delays, or fines.

liquids.title: Rule of liquids (3-1-1)”
liquids.text: The 3-1-1 rule applies to carry-on baggage:
list: 3.4 ounces (100 ml): maximum volume of one container
1 liter: all containers must be placed in one transparent 1 liter bag.
1 bag: one bag of liquids per passenger
liquids.exceptions: Exceptions: medicines, baby food/milk are allowed in volumes over 100 ml and do not require to be bagged, but must be declared at the time of inspection.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Items
prohibited.text: The following items are prohibited in any baggage:

carry_on.title: Carry-on baggage restrictions
carry_on.text: The following items are only allowed in checked baggage:

CheckIn.title: Check-in Information
CheckIn.description: Learn about check-in options, timing, and requirements for your flight

online.title: Online Check-in
online.desc: The fastest and most convenient way to check in for your flight
online.whenTitle: When Can I Check In Online?
online.whenText: Online check-in opens 24 hours before scheduled departure and closes 1 hour before departure.

1.title: Find Your Booking
1.desc: Enter your booking reference and last name

2.title: Select Seats
2.desc: Choose or confirm your seat assignment

5.title: Get Boarding Pass
5.desc: Download, print, or save to your mobile device

web.title: Web Check-in
web.desc: Check in through our website from any device with internet access.

steps.2: Enter your booking reference and last name
steps.3: Follow the steps to complete check-in

app.title: Mobile App Check-in
app.desc: Check in through our mobile app for the most seamless experience.

steps.1: Download our app from App Store or Google Play
steps.2: Log in or access your booking
steps.4: Save boarding pass directly to your phone

items.1: Skip the check-in counter lines at the airport
items.2: Select your preferred seat in advance
items.3: Add baggage without waiting in line
items.4: Save time at the airport - just drop your bags if needed

airport.title: Airport Check-in
airport.desc: Traditional check-in at airport counters and self-service kiosks

when.domestic: Domestic flights: At least 90 minutes before departure
when.international: International flights: At least 3 hours before departure

counter.title: Counter Check-in
counter.desc: Visit our check-in counters where our staff will assist you:

steps.1: Present your booking reference or e-ticket
steps.2: Show valid identification (passport for international flights)

kiosk.title: Self-Service Kiosks
kiosk.desc: Use our self-service kiosks for a faster experience:

steps.1: Scan your booking QR code or enter booking details
steps.3: Print your boarding pass and baggage tags
steps.4: Drop your tagged bags at the bag drop counter

items.1: Valid passport (valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel date)
45 minutes before departure for domestic flights
items.2: 60 minutes before departure for international flights

desc.2: Arriving after these deadlines may result in denied boarding.

special.title: Special Assistance
special.desc: Information for passengers requiring special assistance during check-in and travel

alert.title: Request in Advance
alert.desc: Please request any special assistance at least 48 hours before your flight for optimal service. You can add special assistance to your booking online or by contacting our customer service.

types.title: Types of Special Assistance
types.desc: Download, print, or save to your mobile device

items.2: Assistance boarding and disembarking the aircraft

items.1: Priority boarding for families with young children

animals.title: Service Animals
animals.desc: Guidelines for traveling with service animals:

items.1: Service dogs are allowed in the cabin free of charge

process.desc: When checking in with special assistance needs:

steps.1: Arrive at the airport at least 30 minutes earlier than the recommended time
steps.2: Proceed to the dedicated Special Assistance counter or inform a staff member at the regular check-in counter
steps.3: Present your booking confirmation with the pre-requested assistance
steps.4: Our staff will guide you through the check-in process and arrange for the requested assistance
steps.5: For wheelchair assistance, you'll be escorted through security and to your gate

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.desc: For questions or to arrange special assistance:
contact.online: Online: Login to your booking and select "Manage Special Requests"

LoginPage.title: Login
LoginPage.description: Sign in to your account to access your bookings

Home.title: Explore the World with SkyJet
Home.description: Find and book flights to hundreds of destinations worldwide at the best prices

flightSearch.title: Flight Search
flightSearch.cardDescription: Discover the best options for your trip
flightSearch.errorSearching: An error occurred while searching for flights
